title: intro
body:
Ian: Hello! My name is Ian, and I’m excited to meet you! 
Ian: We’ve been assigned to this remote village as representatives from the Ministry of Education, Culture, Science, and Technology. 
Ian: Our mission is to make this village more digitally friendly and bring new opportunities to the community.
Ian: Our first task is to head to the local school. That’s where we’ll be meeting some of the teachers and students, and we’ll get a better idea of what they need from us. 
Ian: I think they’re a bit curious about what we’re doing here, so let’s make a good first impression!
Ian: Alright! Let’s make a difference—one step at a time.
Ian: Using your arrow keys.
Ian: Go Right and Up after these concrete buildings to find the school.
